title: Efficiency in Photocatalytic Production of Hydrogen: Energetic and Sustainability implications

Hydrogen generation through a photocatalytic process appears a promising technology to produce this energy vector through a novel, efficient, green, and sustainable process. The fruitful use of sunlight as excitation...
